page.title: 18THE HIGH ROAD WILLESDEN GRN
page.content: {Willesden High Road}offers much to the local community. A large supermarket should open this summer (1985). Apart from that there are only small ones. The road contains many small shops which act as tobacconists and grocers, many open until quite late. The greengrocers have a vast selection of vegetables and fruits reflecting {diverse cultural backgrounds.}Take away food shops and restaurants cater for every taste and make up a good percentage of the High Road traders. Most of the major banks are here, as are the building societies and the borough's{central library}which at present is undergoing redevelopment. The Police Station and Post Office are also on the High Road. The{major problem}is the level of {traffic.}This is heavy throughout the day leading to many delays.
